name: Myounghoon Philart Jeon
content: Myounghoon "Philart" Jeon | Grado Department of Industrial and Systems Engineering | Virginia Tech Myounghoon "Philart" Jeon Professor Myounghoon "Philart" Jeon Philart Jeon 519G Whittemore Hall (MC 0118) 1185 Perry Street Blacksburg, VA 24061 myounghoonjeon@vt.edu 540-231-3510 Personal website       ResearchGate       Google Scholar Research Areas Main Area:  Human-Computer Interaction/ Human-Robot Interaction Sound and Music Computing Affective Computing Assistive Technologies Automotive User Interfaces Aesthetic Computing Education Ph.D., Engineering Psychology and Human-Computer Interaction, Georgia Institute of Technology M.S., Engineering Psychology, Georgia Institute of Technology M.S., Cognitive Sciences (Cognitive Engineering), Yonsei University, South Korea B.S., Psychology, Sociology, Yonsei University, South Korea Professional History Associate Professor, Department of Industrial and Systems Engineering, Virginia Tech, August 2018 - Present Associate Professor, Department of Cognitive and Learning Sciences, Department of Computer Science, Michigan Tech, August 2016-August 2018 Assistant Professor, Department of Cognitive and Learning Sciences, Department of Computer Science, Michigan Tech, August 2012-August 2016 Recent Courses Taught ISE 6624 Advanced Topics in HF: Affective Design and Computing ISE 6614 Human Computer Systems ISE 5654 Human Factors in System Design ISE 3614 Intro to Human Factors Engineering Selected Recent Publications Cao, Y., Yuan, J., Li, L., & Jeon, M.
